alert.note: Alert for Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:44PM CDT until June 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galliano, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Galliano, Golden Meadow and Leeville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
